sqlMap.select: SELECT A.supply_id , A.supply_type_id , B.type_name , A.item_name , A.item_unit , A.obsolete_tag , A.location , A.reorder_level , A.actual_count , A.remarks , TRUNC(A.date_added) date_added , A.last_user , TRUNC(A.last_update) last_update FROM SUPPLIES_GROUP1 A , SUPPLY_TYPES_GROUP1 B WHERE A.supply_type_id = B.supply_type_id AND NVL(A.obsolete_tag, 'N') = 'N' ORDER BY 1

SELECT A.supply_id , A.supply_type_id , B.type_name , A.item_name , A.item_unit , A.obsolete_tag , A.location , A.reorder_level , A.actual_count , A.remarks , TRUNC(A.date_added) date_added , A.last_user , TRUNC(A.last_update) last_update FROM SUPPLIES_GROUP1 A , SUPPLY_TYPES_GROUP1 B WHERE a.supply_type_id = b.supply_type_id AND NVL(A.obsolete_tag, 'N') = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(a.supply_id) LIKE '%' || DECODE(#supplyId#, -1, TO_CHAR(a.supply_id),#supplyId#) || '%' ORDER BY 1
SELECT supply_type_id , type_name , entry_date , last_user , last_update FROM SUPPLY_TYPES_GROUP1
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SUPPLIES_GROUP1 (supply_id , supply_type_id , item_name , item_unit , obsolete_tag , location , reorder_level , actual_count , remarks , date_added , last_user , last_update) VALUES (GROUP1_SUPPLY_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #supplyTypeId# , #itemName# , #itemUnit# , #obsoleteTag# , #location# , #reorderLevel# , #actualCount# , #remarks# , #dateAdded# , #lastUser# , TRUNC(SYSDATE))

UPDATE SUPPLIES_GROUP1 SET item_name = #itemName# , item_unit = #itemUnit# , obsolete_tag = #obsoleteTag# , location = #location# , reorder_level = #reorderLevel# , remarks = #remarks# , date_added = #dateAdded# , last_user = #lastUser# , last_update = TRUNC(SYSDATE) WHERE supply_id = #supplyId#
